Posts.Content: I go to a local hospice that offer treatment to those of us who have this bloody thing and they are taking on this new acupuncture as it seams there is a good result in helping with fatigue , so if they are doing it it must be ok as they would not put any of us in a position that would harm us as they are here to help and make our life through this journey a little easier , I quite fancy it , but due to not really starting my chemo yet, I do not need it , but later I may have a good look at it . I did have hypnotherapy the other day and if you are open to these things I highly recommend it , it made my day yesterday far more bareable and a lot easier. See my blog below it explains a lot more xxxxx

Yes I got steroids for 3 days and on the first reaction they gave me more steroids and antihistamines and tried again , it's common apparently , some times the extra stuff helps and you can get through it but I'm must just be sensitive to it , they may try again next week or give me the tax after the fec instead of before but who knows , they have loads to chose from , so I may just give me 6 fec as that is another common choice of treatment , watch this space xx
Posts.Title: Allergic reaction to tax

Posts.Content: Hoping to find out today what treatment I will be getting due to the reaction I had on Friday, even though I only was able to get under a 5th of the bag in me I still have had side affect especially aches in my bones , I have had to take painkillers every 2 hours and do feel wobbly in the morning ,I can't imagine you guys out there that had the full bag and times that by 3 , you guys should be well proud you brave people. Now I have had a taste of things to come I'm now worried that its going to get really bad , They did mention that I may only have 6 fec instead I hope that it does not compromise my treatment , wonder how they decided what to give you , and if that does not work how they decided what alternative to have . Back to now knowing again
Posts.Title: Allergic reaction to tax

Posts.Content: So been for first chemo today and because I agreed to go on to a trial I was goin to have tax 1st , so all the bloods went well and I got hooked up to my new allie , but I have an allergic reaction I started having a really bad hot flush and wanted to take all my cloths off , but I didn't , so they there a load of antihistamine and steroids in me and tied again dripping it in slower and after 20 mins it happens again , so I have been pulled off this drug now and may possibly just having 6 fec instead , has this happened to any one else ?.?? We just feel really disappointed that I was not able to start my fight and I have to go back again next week to start anew course of action. , and I'm hoping this I not the way it's going to go and that the next set of drugs my body will accept.Â  Sarah xxx
Posts.Title: Allergic reaction to tax

Posts.Content: Brilliant news Caroline , Stay around as its nice to hear from others that have kicked the arse of this and still around to tell their story, I'm just starting my journey 1st chemo on Friday x Massive well done you Xxx
Posts.Title: good news
